name: unicode-symbols
title: Unicode Symbols Search
description: Browse and copy-paste common Unicode symbols.
author: mmazzarolo

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Unicode Symbol
commands.description: Browse and copy-paste common Unicode symbols.

preferences.name: searchResultLimitStr
preferences.title: Search results limit
preferences.description: Maximum number of items shown in the list. The lower the number of shown items is, the faster they'll be retrieved. Defaults to 100. Supports up to 1000 items.

preferences.name: viewType
preferences.title: View Type
preferences.description: Type of view to use to display the results.

preferences.name: gridItemSize
preferences.title: Grid Item Size
preferences.description: Control the size of individual grid cells in the grid view.

preferences.name: dataSet
preferences.title: Data Set
preferences.description: The data set to use for the search. By default it uses the minimal data set, which contains about 5400 characters. The full set contains +40000 characters. Using this big of a dataset might impact performance. Note: In 'List View' only the minimal dataset is supported.

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.title: Primary Action
preferences.description: The action to perform when selecting an item.

scripts.generate: npm run generate-dataset && npm run generate-htmlset
